identified-content.object.title: Advertising (Times Column)
identified-content.classifier: Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Marketing, Advertising and PR

block.p: * Arnold Ingalls Moranville, San Francisco, was named the first agency to handle two accounts, with combined billings estimated at $10 million. They were Bookface, San Francisco, an online bookstore to be introduced in the summer, and Chain Link Technologies, Sunnyvale, Calif., an electronic business software company. Arnold Ingalls is part of the Arnold Communications unit of Snyder Communications, which is being acquired by Havas Advertising. * GetFit.com, Redwood Shores, Calif., a Web site that offers fitness and nutrition information, to Tonic 360, San Francisco, to handle its first account. Billings were estimated at $8 million to $10 million. * MyDrugRep.com, Newport Beach, Calif., a company specializing in helping pharmaceutical marketers sell products and services to doctors, to Prime Access, New York, as its first agency. Billings have not been determined.
